document_data.name: Upper Towers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Uppers Towers''' was the formal name given to a pair of parallel, major torchtowers — civic owned guard towers that stood along the city of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Trollwall]].{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-10-17 - Waterdeep's Torchtowers}}<ref group="note" name="torchtower">Every tower connected to the Trollwall falls under the designation of "torchtower."<ref group="note" name="major">The sourcebook ''[[City System]]'' states that all torchtowers with names are "major towers".
document_data.Location: These towers stood in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]], in the center of its border with the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. They stood on either side of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]], where it carried on into the [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]].

Structure.Interior: Being torchtowers, the Upper Towers both had all the features that were common among them. This included a debriefing room, a small armory, holding cells, storage rooms for the holding of evidence or confiscated items, some bedchambers, and some garderobes. Additionally, being major torchtowers, the Upper Towers both had six small holding cells that could hold up to ten people, which were used in times of trouble.<ref><ref group="note" name="major" />

document_data.Activities: Like all other torchtowers, these towers both had three beacon-fires that were constantly kept on standby.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Upper Towers were manned by members of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]].
